name: Snow Plow Rescue Truck Driving 3D Simulator
name_original: Snow Plow Rescue Truck Driving 3D Simulator
description:
Heavy snowfall had blocked the highway roads and streets for traffic mobility. People are planning family reunion and dinner for Christmas Eve but stuck at home due to snowfalls. Play as a snow plow truck driver to clear the frozen roads and bring relief for smooth driving.

Features:

Operate multiple gigantic construction cranes
10 challenging driving and parking levels with full fun activities
Real physics controls for operating heavy cranes on hilly environment
On screen touch controls for crane and cars driving
Amazing inner and free cam for fun game play
HD graphics and superb sounds to enhance your gaming experience


This is very fun but challenging snow truck driver game. You drive multiple construction cranes and clear the ice frozen slippery roads. Heavy snow falling creates roadblocks on different location across the town on mountain. Use your master hill climb truck driving skills as gigantic crane operator. Operate heavy excavator crane for excavation process. Use hydraulic winch and scoop to collect all ice blocks and dump them in dumper trucks. Operate heavy bulldozer crane to break and collect hard ice frozen on the highway so people can drive cars around city. Don’t let snowfall ruin Christmas vacations for citizens. Get behind steering wheel of snow plower truck and make a way so they can shop in shopping center and watch movies in near theater.

As dump truck driver steer your heavy vehicle loaded with ice and dispose it to some empty trench over mountain. After plowing all snow with heavy digger cranes it's time to go home and celebrate xmas with your family. Drive your car stuck in snow blocks and make your way to home. Drive heavy excavator crane for dumping all snow into dumper trucks. Enjoy operating amazing construction cranes with hill climb challenges in slippery tracks.
